timeline.bodyText: @loicmathieu I'm not really happy about this change but, when switching to Jackson, I end up with name being null in the deserialized Person.
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText:
It's strange.
I remember noticing that Jackson and JSON-B are not configured the same way. And Restassured used a different ObjectMapper configuration than the application.
Anyway, your change is strange, it should not have any impact and name should not be null.
If you want to merge your PR with this change, create a followup issue so someone (me or @geoand, the master of serialization ;) ) can have a look.
replies.author: loicmathieu

replies.bodyText: Yeah, I had a PR to make RestAssured use the applications's ObjectMapper, but I never merged it because it does not work in native tests and would therefore create far too much confusion.
replies.author: geoand

replies.bodyText: so name is serialized OK by Quarkus but somehow the ObjectMapper of REST Assured doesn't deserialize it properly. What is extremely weird is that REST Assured was already using Jackson.
replies.author: gsmet
